title: HDFC Bank September quarter loan growth may dip below 10% on year: Macquarie Capital
description: HDFC Bank, India's largest private sector lender, may see its loan growth dip below 10% in the September quarter due to plans to sell Rs 70,000 crore of loans and the base effect from its merger with HDFC Corporation. The bank is also focusing on reducing its loan to deposit ratio and improving margins.
